attributes.review: I had this app for about a week to keep up with trump. Turns out his policies are wack and he seems to be one if the worst presidents we have had. Pack up your things and get ready to leave the Oval Office.

attributes.title: Horrible and racist person

attributes.review: i am so dissapointed. i thought this was the donald trump app, not the monkey lunchbox app. as soon as i opened the app, an orange popped up instead of potus? umm what?! i really wanted to use this app professionally, but no. it gave me severe heath issues such as uncontrollable pooping. i am currently on the toilet, and i just had to write this review. if you’re a 50 year old trump supporter reading this, don’t get the app. my review so far has been 100% accurate.
